short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple tool to block distracting websites, manage temporary pauses, and help you stay focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Productivity Guard helps you stay on track by blocking distracting websites and giving you control over your browsing habits. With this tool, you can prevent yourself from accessing time-wasting sites and focus on what really matters.

Key Features:

Add Sites to Block List: Block distracting sites with a simple click or manual entry.
Pause Sites Temporarily: Need a short break? Pause any blocked site for a specific amount of time with custom durations.
"Enter Anyway" Option: If you need to access a blocked site, allow temporary access for 15 minutes with the click of a button. The site will automatically block itself again after the timer expires.
Scrollable Lists: Easily view and manage your blocked and paused sites with a sleek, scrollable interface.
Custom Alerts: Get reminders with an overlay when visiting blocked sites to encourage productivity.
Intuitive UI: Clean, user-friendly design to help you stay focused with minimal distractions.
Whether you're trying to concentrate on work, study more efficiently, or limit distractions during your day, Productivity Guard keeps you accountable and focused.

Stay on top of your goals and reduce time spent on unproductive activities. Productivity Guard puts the control back in your hands.
